name: Neck Rolls
description: Gentle neck stretches to relieve tension from desk work
instructions: Sit up straight in your chair
Slowly roll your head in a clockwise direction
Reverse direction and do 5 counter-clockwise circles

name: Shoulder Shrugs
description: Release shoulder tension and improve posture
instructions: Sit or stand with arms at your sides
Lift your shoulders up toward your ears

name: Wrist Circles
description: Prevent wrist strain from typing and mouse use
instructions: Extend your arms in front of you
Make slow circles with your wrists

name: Desk Push-ups
description: Upper body strength exercise using your desk
instructions: Stand arm's length from your desk
Place hands on desk edge, shoulder-width apart
Keep body straight and lean forward

name: Calf Raises
description: Strengthen calves and improve circulation
instructions: Stand behind your chair for support

name: Seated Spinal Twist
description: Improve spine mobility and reduce back stiffness
instructions: Place right hand on left knee

name: Chair Squats
description: Strengthen legs and glutes using your chair
instructions: Stand in front of your chair
Lower yourself as if sitting down
Stop just before touching the chair

name: Eye Exercises
description: Reduce eye strain from screen work
instructions: Focus on something 20 feet away for 20 seconds
Close eyes and rest for 10 seconds

name: Deep Breathing
description: Reduce stress and improve focus
instructions: Place one hand on chest, one on belly
Feel your belly rise more than chest

name: Wall Push-ups
description: Gentle upper body exercise for beginners
instructions: Stand arm's length from a wall
Place palms against wall at shoulder height

name: Standing Quad Stretch
description: Stretch front thigh muscles
instructions: Stand next to your chair for support
Bend your right knee behind you
Hold your right ankle with your hand

name: Hip Circles
description: Improve hip mobility and reduce stiffness
instructions: Make large circles with your hips

name: Marching in Place
description: Light cardio to boost energy and circulation
instructions: Lift right knee to waist level

name: Ankle Circles
description: Improve ankle mobility and circulation
instructions: Lift right foot off the ground

name: Chest Doorway Stretch
description: Open chest muscles and improve posture

name: Seated Leg Extensions
description: Strengthen quadriceps while seated
instructions: Sit in your chair with back straight

name: Standing Side Bends
description: Stretch side muscles and improve flexibility
instructions: Return to center and repeat on other side

name: Standing Forward Fold
description: Stretch hamstrings and relieve back tension

name: Arm Circles
description: Warm up shoulders and improve mobility
instructions: Stand with arms extended to sides
Start small and grow the circles

name: Seated Cat-Cow Stretch
description: Improve spinal flexibility while seated
instructions: Arch your back and look up (cow)
Round your back and drop chin (cat)
